alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Sarpy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:42PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sarpy and western Douglas Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elkhorn, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Flanagan Lake around 745 PM CDT. Bennington, Zorinsky Lake and Standing Bear Lake around 750 PM CDT. Boys Town, Millard, Chalco and Wehrspann Lake around 755 PM CDT. Prairie Queen Recreation Area around 800 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include La Vista. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 440 and 446. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for east central Nebraska.
